gadafnnkijfmbbmeielphlapddbmgbgo.short_description: Context menu to close - tabs to the left, tabs to the right, other tabs, tabs from same domain, curr...
gadafnnkijfmbbmeielphlapddbmgbgo.full_description:
Context menu to close - tabs to the left, tabs to the right, other tabs, tabs from same domain, current tab, window and more

Provide context menu (popup that appear on right click) close button with following options

1. Close tabs to the left of current tab
2. Close tabs to the right of current tab
3. Close other tabs except current tab
4. Close current tab
6. Close tabs from current domain / website 
7. Close tabs from other domain / website except current one
8. Close window
9. Option to disable context menu

The options is available via...
Right click on any webpage --> Click Close Tabs --> Click Options 

More extensions at http://tejji.com/browser/chrome/extensions/

Thanks,
http://tejji.com

v1.2 - 2018-09-13
- changes to ensure compliance Chrome Web Store policies

ignachbibbeengfepmkeogegpfkigljc.short_description: Identify CSR content for SEO optimization. Visualize CSR vs SSR with charts. Disable JS to test sear...
ignachbibbeengfepmkeogegpfkigljc.full_description:
Identify CSR content for SEO optimization. Visualize CSR vs SSR with charts. Disable JS to test search engine indexability.

𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝟐.𝟎 (𝐀𝐮𝐠𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓)
• Elements tab with stacked SSR/CSR breakdown and per-category insights
• One‑click PDF report export (includes donut chart and element breakdown)
• Performance tab with live signals (TTFB, FCP, LCP, CLS, TBT) and request waterfall
• Color‑blind palettes and accessibility settings (persisted per user)

𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝟏.𝟏 𝐔𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞:
• Improved user experience: Extension now only works on the active tab
• New feature: Doughnut chart showing estimated CSR vs SSR percentages
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes

▶ 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬:
• Identifies potentially client-side rendered content
• Highlights potentially problematic areas in red
• Provides an approximate percentage of the page that might be client-side rendered
• Simplifies technical SEO discussions with developers

▶ 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦 𝐢𝐭 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐯𝐞𝐬:
This extension suggests which parts of a webpage might be rendered on the client side, which can be less visible to search engines and potentially impact website rankings. As an SEO professional, you can use these insights to guide your investigation in Google Search Console, where you should inspect the page's indexed code and check for the suggested elements.

▶ 𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐮𝐬𝐞:
1- Install the Chrome extension
2- Toggle it on when viewing a webpage
3- Analyze the highlighted areas and percentage to identify potentially client-side rendered content
4- Use these insights to guide your inspection in Google Search Console

⚠ 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞:  While this tool provides valuable insights, it's not 100% accurate. Use it as a hint to inform your SEO strategy, but always conduct further analysis in Google Search Console for comprehensive optimization.

goanbaknlbojfglcepjnankoobfakbpg.short_description: Quickly resolve digital object identifiers to their web destinations
goanbaknlbojfglcepjnankoobfakbpg.full_description:
Quickly resolve digital object identifiers to their web destinations

Use this extension to quickly resolve DOI and ShortDOI codes via any one of several methods: extension button, right-click on selected text, or omnibox with keyword: doi.

DOI Resolver packs some great additional features, too:
1) Generate QR codes which can be scanned by smartphones to share a publication
2) Automatically convert DOI codes on web pages into links (optional)
3) Specify your own DOI resolver URL (useful if your institution provides a proxy service)
4) Generate formatted citations for publications
5) Maintain a history of viewed DOIs

No user data is collected by this extension and no information is sent back to the author.

This is an open source project. https://github.com/mdmower/doi-resolver

Omnibox usage: Type doi and press the space key. Now you can input a DOI code and press enter to retrieve the web destination.

Rebump gives you these powerful Rebump email tools:

✓ Unlimited Messages

✓ Specify Bump days and times
✓ A Dashboard to monitor all emails

✓ Integration with your existing CRM
✓ Alternate Email Address
✓ Up to 10 Bumps per message
✓ Track if your email was opened/read/link-clicked
✓ Personalize Your Bumps
✓ Create Multiple Bump Sequences
✓ Attach Files to Bumps
✓ Gmail Signatures 
✓ API

Rebump is a favorite Gmail productivity extension for automating follow-up email because of its ease of use, reliable results, and very low price. 

Fully compatible with the most popular productivity apps, including Rapportive, Sidekick Hubspot Sales, Boomerang, Yesware, Streak CRM and Dropbox extensions.

pegiihfbfblmhendfgjmcjnofblcigga.short_description: Shopify Competitor Analysis, Shopify App Detector & Shopify Theme Detector. Spy & Detect Competitor ...
pegiihfbfblmhendfgjmcjnofblcigga.full_description:
Shopify Competitor Analysis, Shopify App Detector & Shopify Theme Detector. Spy & Detect Competitor Store Products Apps & Themes

Are you curious about the apps fueling a competitor's store? Or perhaps you're smitten by a store's theme and wish to know its name? Shoper Spy is here to satiate your curiosity. With just a few clicks, unveil the apps and theme a Shopify store is utilizing, unless it's a bespoke theme crafted from scratch.

Uncover the secrets behind successful Shopify stores with Shoper Spy! Originally crafted and nurtured by a team of Shopify owners along with a vibrant community of contributors, Shoper Spy is your go-to tool for spying on your competitors. This robust Shopify App/Theme Detector  will bring you closer to the arsenal of apps and themes employed by any specific Shopify store that catches your eye.

We thrive on feedback and community involvement. Your insights could be the catalyst for the next big update! If there's an app you wish we could detect or if you have suggestions to enhance Shoper Spy, we're all ears.

Shoper Spy is not just a tool; it's your companion in the quest for e-commerce excellence. By unveiling the technological wizardry of successful Shopify stores, it provides a ladder for aspiring merchants to climb up and level the playing field. So why wait? Embark on a journey of discovery and competitive intelligence with Shoper Spy, and equip yourself with the knowledge to propel your Shopify store to new heights!

In addition to uncovering apps and themes, Shoper Spy also spies on competitor products, giving you detailed insights into their offerings. Discover best-selling products, the most expensive and cheapest items, and the newest additions to their catalog. With this information, you can strategize better, align your inventory with market demands, and stay ahead of the competition.

Shoper Spy provides a comprehensive view of your competitor’s product range, including total product count and details on sourcing. By understanding their product strategies, you can learn how to source similar or better products for your store, optimizing your offerings to meet customer preferences. This not only helps in competitive pricing but also ensures you stock the latest trends, giving your store a competitive edge.

The ultimate Shopify Chrome extension designed for e-commerce entrepreneurs who want to stay ahead of the competition. In the fast-paced world of online retail, knowing what tools and technologies your competitors are using can give you a significant advantage. That's exactly what Shoper Spy offers—an edge to understand, analyze, and outmaneuver your competition.

Shoper Spy is tailored specifically for Shopify store owners. It seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, allowing you to instantly uncover the Shopify apps and technologies employed by any Shopify store with just a click. Whether you're curious about the latest marketing plugins, customer service tools, or checkout enhancements your competitors are using, Shoper Spy provides you with the insights needed to make informed decisions.

But Shoper Spy is more than just an app detection tool. It's a comprehensive competitor analysis platform that helps you spy on your competitors' strategies. By understanding what apps they're using, you can infer their sales tactics, marketing strategies, and customer engagement approaches. This knowledge enables you to adapt and improve your own store, ensuring you're not just keeping up but staying ahead.

This Shopify app detector is a great alternative to koala inspector extension, shopify app detector by fera.ai, Shopify App Detector by EZFY, best Shopify App detector (ShopifyAppdetector.com) & Fritz AI Powered Shopify App Detector, ShopifyHunt - Shopify™ store parser & spy, Shopify Analyzer, Shopify Scraper, Raise - Shopify™ store analysis tool, PPSPY- Shopify analytics & dropship tool, Shopify spy scraper & parser.

In today’s competitive e-commerce landscape, being equipped with the right data can transform your business strategy. Shoper Spy empowers you to turn competitors’ insights into your strategic advantage, enhancing your ability to innovate and grow your business. Don't just compete; lead the market with Shoper Spy.

Shoper spy has partnered up with the best apps on the market to help you get the best deals of Shopify apps! Disclaimer: Shoper Spy may get affiliate commission from installs initiated by the extension.

ikhahkidgnljlniknmendeflkdlfhonj.short_description: Opens all PDF files directly in the browser.
ikhahkidgnljlniknmendeflkdlfhonj.full_description:
Opens all PDF files directly in the browser.

While most PDF files can be viewed directly in the browser some PDFs will trigger a "Save as"-dialog or will be downloaded automatically. This addon views all PDF files directly in the browser. You can still save the PDF by pressing CTRL+S (or CMD+S) after viewing them.

Some web servers are misconfigured and don't tell the browser that a file is a PDF. In this case the file will still be downloaded even when this addon is active. If you encounter a PDF that is downloaded feel free to send the URL to the support email address so I can check if this it's a bug in the addon or just a server issue.

cllehfhocaopfbkehdoiphpgehffmneh.short_description: Use EML to PDF Chrome Extension to quickly convert eml file to pdf. Save your Outlook or Gmail email...
cllehfhocaopfbkehdoiphpgehffmneh.full_description:
Use EML to PDF Chrome Extension to quickly convert eml file to pdf. Save your Outlook or Gmail emails as pdf in just a few clicks.

✅ Convert eml to pdf effortlessly with this chrome extension, a reliable tool to help you manage and archive important emails. Whether you need to save an email as a pdf for documentation, legal purposes, or just to keep things organized, this extension makes it easy to change EML to PDF with just a few clicks.

📌 How to convert .eml to .pdf

🛠️ Install the extension — Add the eml to pdf converter to your chrome browser.
🛠️ Open the eml file — Drag and drop, or simply select the file you want to transform.
🛠️ Choose format — Click the convert button to initiate the eml to pdf conversion.
🛠️ Save your file — Once the conversion is complete, download the document to your device.
🛠️ Enjoy quick access — Now your email is saved, accessible anytime.

✅ This extension ensures that anyone can convert .eml to pdf without any technical hassle. All attachments, images, and formatting are preserved during the process of eml convert to pdf. Easily convert a batch of eml files to pdf in one go, saving time and improving productivity. Your files are processed securely using industry-standard encryption, and all uploaded files are automatically deleted after conversion to protect your privacy.

📌 Key features:

1️⃣ User-friendly interface
2️⃣ Supports all email types
3️⃣ High-quality pdf conversion
4️⃣ Batch conversion
5️⃣ Secure cloud processing with automatic file deletion

✅ Our tool is built to make converting eml to pdf as smooth as possible. Gone are the days of searching for ways to convert email to PDF manually. This converter automates the process so that you can save email as a pdf in Outlook, Gmail, and many other platforms with just a few simple steps.

📌 Why choose our .eml file to pdf converter?

- Quickly convert email files with our professional cloud-based conversion engine.
- Works seamlessly on chrome, and converts EML format to PDF regardless of the email source.
- Attachments are embedded in the final document, retaining all email data for record-keeping.
- Handles large and complex email files that would crash browser-based converters.
- Choose between standard or high-resolution output for different purposes.
- Your privacy is protected: all files are encrypted during transmission and automatically deleted after conversion.

✅ Ideal for personal and professional use
Whether you download emails from work, convert email to pdf for personal records, or use this tool in a corporate environment, the eml conversion to pdf serves every purpose. From business records to personal files, change EML to PDF easily without any complications.

📌 Privacy & Security

🔒 Your privacy matters to us:
- All files are transmitted using TLS encryption
- Files are automatically deleted immediately after conversion
- We do not store, share, or access your email content
- GDPR compliant data handling


📌 Some benefits of converting electronic mail format to pdf:

1. Preserve Important Information – Convert EML to PDF to save your mail data in a long-lasting, universally accepted format.
2. Accessibility – A final file is much easier to access across devices without needing special email software.
3. Shareability – When your mail save as pdf, sharing becomes easy, whether for legal, business, or personal reasons.
4. Consistency – Final formatting is consistent, so you know your email looks exactly the same every time you open it.

✅ Advanced mail management
With the batch conversion feature, you don't need to go through each mail one by one. Just drag multiple mails into the converter, save email as pdf, and let it work its magic.

📌 Frequently asked questions

❓ How to save an email as a PDF?
💡 Simply upload your eml file, and click to convert. You'll have a downloadable document in seconds.

❓ What if my mail has attachments?
💡 No worries! This converter includes attachments so you have everything in one document.

❓ Can I convert multiple documents at once?
💡 Yes! Convert your mails in batches to save time and improve productivity.

❓ Is my data secure?
💡 Absolutely. All files are encrypted during transmission using TLS, processed securely on our servers, and immediately deleted after conversion. We never store, access, or share your email content.

❓ Do I need an internet connection?
💡 Yes, an internet connection is required to upload files to our secure conversion servers and download the converted PDFs.

📌 Supported formats and mail clients

➤ Convert eml files from Outlook
➤ Save email in Gmail
➤ Convert any .eml with ease

✅ No more struggling with clunky software or manual conversion methods. With this tool, converting emails to pdf is seamless, fast, and reliable.

✅ Perfect solution for busy professionals
For lawyers, business professionals, and administrators, being able to export emails as pdf quickly can save hours. No more time spent figuring out how to save outlook email as pdf or fiddling with screenshots.

✅ With all these features and more, this chrome extension is the only tool you'll need as your eml file converter to pdf. Try it today and experience easy, high-quality pdf conversions at your fingertips.

mcalfpchdglalmmjkgohhcadlfigoglo.short_description: Use A.I. to enhance your job search on Upwork with personalized proposals and real-time alerts.
mcalfpchdglalmmjkgohhcadlfigoglo.full_description:
Use A.I. to enhance your job search on Upwork with personalized proposals and real-time alerts.

Are you tired of spending hours writing cover letters that never seem to get you noticed by potential employers on Upwork? Do you wish you had an easier way to create professional, tailored letters that stand out in a crowded job market? Look no further than UpCat!

UpCat is a browser extension that can help Upwork users write A.I-generated cover letters for job applications. Here are some benefits of using UpCat:

1. Generate professional cover letters in just a few clicks: With UpCat's integration of ChatGPT, you can quickly and easily generate high-quality cover letters that are tailored to the specific job you're applying for.

2. Stay up-to-date on new job openings: Up Cat includes an up alert feature that lets you know when new job posts become available, so you can be one of the first to apply and increase your chances of getting hired.

3. Save time and effort: Instead of spending hours crafting the perfect cover letter, you can use UpCat to generate a strong, professional letter in just a few minutes. This allows you to focus your time and energy on other aspects of your job search, like researching potential employers or networking.

4. Improve your chances of getting hired: A well-written cover letter can be the difference between getting an interview or getting passed over. With UpCat, you can be confident that you're submitting a top-notch letter that will make a great impression on potential employers.

So why wait? Download UpCat now and start turning heads with your professional, A.I-generated cover letters & up alerts. And if you have any questions or need support, don't hesitate to reach out to us at hello@codespikex.com. We're here to help you succeed on Upwork!

• Bookmarks are automatically synced with Chrome

🔄 Seamless Integration:
• Uses native Chrome bookmarks for data persistence
• Works with existing Chrome tab groups
• Minimal performance impact
• Clean, modern interface

Keep your browsing organized and boost your productivity with Arcify - the Arc-inspired tab management solution for Chrome! 🚀

mcoimieglmhdjdoplhpcmifgplkbfibp.short_description: Highlight text on page to copy to Roam
mcoimieglmhdjdoplhpcmifgplkbfibp.full_description:
Highlight text on page to copy to Roam

This Highlighter extension is meant for use with Roam Research note taking application to help "clip" web pages by highlighting all the areas you want to save in Roam and then easily copying/pasting into Roam in a Roam friendly format. You also are able to Double Bracket words / phrases with the extension so that they create Page/Link references when pasted into Roam.

For full instructions, How To's, and Demos please visit: https://github.com/GitMurf/roam-highlighter#roam-highlighter

BASIC INSTRUCTIONS:

[ALT + X]
	- Activate Extension and Show/Hide Side Window
[Ctrl + X]
	- Highlights selected text
	- To remove part of a highlight, select text and press [Ctrl + X]
[Alt + Click]
	- Removes an entire highlight
[ALT + Q]
	- Remove all highlights on the page
[ALT + A]
	- Makes selected highlighted a "header"; highlights following will nest until another highlight is selected as a "header"
[Double-Click] a Single Word (has to be highlighted already)
	- Adds [[Double Brackets]] for Roam "Page Linking"
[ALT + Z] (must already be highlighted)
	- Adds [[Double Brackets]] around selection for Roam "Page Linking"

If you have any Issues, Questions or Feedback for improving the Instructions or the Extension, please open a GitHub Issue and post your thoughts:

https://github.com/GitMurf/roam-highlighter/issues/new

Thanks and enjoy!

mjfahldkpjhcnfbbmdhpjolcjpcfhcpj.full_description:
Unleash your Web Browser's potential!

A multi purpose Chrome extension that does all this & more:

- Set your Custom "Home Page" under Options, in this extension.
- Open that Custom Page in "New Tab" instead of the Home Page.
- Toolbar icon for easy access to Downloads, History, Bookmarks.
- Automatically force YouTube videos to play at high definition.
- Right click on an Image to perform a Reverse Image search.
- Right click after selecting a plain text URL to open as link.
- Double click on a plain text link to open URL in a new tab.
- Click icon (next to Menu) for a Cached version or Translation.
- Select some Website text, click Ctrl+Alt (Opt) for Translation.
- Ability to change/spoof the browser 'User Agent' when needed.
- Right-Click while holding Ctrl+Alt to remove a page element.
- History Navigation: Hold Right Mouse button, swipe left/right.
- Customize where new tabs open, and tab order when they close.
- Basic cookie management allows for export, import and wipes.
- Don't forget to check the Help section inside the Options page.

Security permissions that should be enabled for all the features:

"Allow access to file URLs" is required if opening local files as new tabs.
"Allow in private mode" has to be checked in order to work in incognito.
"Allow access to search pages" needed for search engine result pages.

For Chrome, Brave, Opera, Vivaldi, and Edge (Chromium) browsers.

ebbjjgknalnhiikophnjodoenamanonj.short_description: Convert pdf to text and copy content in a click. The easiest way to extract text from protected PDFs...
ebbjjgknalnhiikophnjodoenamanonj.full_description:
Convert pdf to text and copy content in a click. The easiest way to extract text from protected PDFs and summarize it with AI.

Key Features of PDF to text:

➤ Extract text from scanned PDF
➤ Copy extracted text
➤ Download PDF text in .txt format
➤ Read the text aloud
➤ Save extracted pdf text history

How PDF to Text Works?

1️⃣ Upload a file to PDF to text convertor
2️⃣ Click the “Extract text” button
3️⃣ Get a text from a pdf in a few seconds

In today's digital age, managing large volumes of information is a common challenge. PDF-documents, widely used for their consistent formatting and portability, often present obstacles when it comes to editing or extracting text. 

This is where a PDF to text converter becomes indispensable. It empowers users to convert static pdfs into editable text files, offering flexibility and ease of use across various applications.

The Benefits of PDF to Text Conversion

The advantages of converting PDF files to text extend beyond convenience. Here are some key reasons why this tool is essential in various fields:

📌 Time-Saving: documents, while secure, often require conversion for editing or analysis. 
📌 Efficiency: you can quickly extract, edit, and incorporate information into other projects without hassle.
📌 Accessibility: the content becomes accessible to all, enhancing inclusivity for users with visual impairments
📌 Flexibility: Once your PDF is in text format, you have the freedom to manipulate the data as you need.
📌 Accuracy: A reliable PDF text extractor ensures that every word is captured correctly during the conversion

When Do You Need a PDF to Text Converter?

💡 For Students: easier quoting and referencing without retyping the content.
💡 For Lawyers: in legal fields, contracts and court document. 
💡 For Business Analysts: Extracting data from financial reports, marketing plans, or other business documents
💡 For Writers and Journalists: pull quotes or information from press releases or reports. 

Overcoming Common Challenges in PDF to Text Conversion

📍One common issue is dealing with non-selectable text, especially in scanned documents. These files are often just images of text, meaning traditional methods of copying and pasting won’t work. 

📍To overcome this, you can use Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology.  OCR scans the document and extracts the text, making it editable and searchable.

📍Another issue arises with PDFs that have complex formatting, such as tables, columns, or graphics. Converting these documents into text can sometimes lead to formatting issues. 

📍However, high-quality PDF to text converters are designed to handle such challenges by preserving as much of the original structure as possible.


FAQ

1. What is PDF to Text conversion?
It is the process of extracting editable text from documents. It allows users to copy, edit, and repurpose text from static files.

2. How do I extract text from a pdf?
Upload the document, click "Extract Text," and get the content in seconds.

3. Can I extract text from scanned PDFs?
Yes, the tool uses OCR technology to extract text from scanned or image-based docs.

4. Is the extracted text editable?
Absolutely! Once extracted, the text is fully editable and can be saved as a .txt file.

5. Can I copy text from a protected pdf?
Yes, as long as permissions allow it; otherwise, secured content may require specific access rights.

6. What else can I do with extracted text?
You can read it allowed and summarize with AI

7. Is pdf to text free?
Our app is in beta-testing and it’s absolutely free now. We plan to make a subscription in the future because OCR technology is paid.

Conclusion: Empowering Your Workflow with PDF to Text Conversion.

At its core, transformative writing is about making information more accessible and easier to work with. As the digital world continues to grow, the demand for quick and efficient access to content will only increase. 

Transformative writing allows you to unlock the potential of your documents by turning static content into dynamic, editable text that can be easily reused, analyzed, or repurposed.

In the future, as more industries continue to embrace digital workflows, PDF to text converters will remain an invaluable tool for anyone who works with documents.

Whether you're handling contracts, research papers, reports, or personal documents, the ability to quickly extract and edit text will improve your productivity and enhance the way you interact with digital content. 

Unlock the full potential of your documents today with a reliable PDF to text converter!

kccndgffmghcnbhodjkidogigegfbbjf.short_description: FlipaCreate: Flipaclip For PC – Create Flipaclip-style animations on your PC. Download the extension...
kccndgffmghcnbhodjkidogigegfbbjf.full_description:
FlipaCreate: Flipaclip For PC – Create Flipaclip-style animations on your PC. Download the extension and start animating now!

FlipaCreate: Flipaclip For PC ✨ is a powerful web-based animation studio that runs directly in your Chrome browser. It provides professional-grade animation tools 🎨 that let artists, designers, students, and hobbyists create frame-by-frame animations 🎞️ without installing complex software. With an intuitive interface inspired by industry-standard tools, FlipaCreate makes animation accessible to everyone 💻.

🔑 Features Of FlipaCreate: Flipaclip For PC

✅ Frame-by-Frame Animation – Create animations with precise control over each frame
✅ Multi-Layer Support – Organize your artwork with multiple layers for complex compositions
✅ Professional Drawing Tools – Brush, eraser, shape tools, text tool, and fill tool with customizable settings
✅ Onion Skinning – See previous frames as you draw for perfect animation timing
✅ Animation Timeline – Easy-to-use timeline for managing frames and playback
✅ Canvas Controls – Zoom 🔍, pan ✋, and resize your canvas as needed
✅ Export Options – Save your work as GIFs or PNG sequences 🖼️
✅ Project Management – Save and load your animation projects easily
✅ Keyboard Shortcuts – Boost your productivity ⚡ with convenient shortcuts
✅ Responsive Design – Works on various screen sizes 📱💻


📌 How to Use FlipaCreate: Flipaclip For PC

Getting Started: After installing the extension, FlipaCreate opens automatically in a new tab. You can also click the extension icon anytime to open it.

Create a New Project: Set your canvas size, frame rate 🎚️, and project name using the “New” button.

✍️ Drawing Tools:
     🖌️ Brush Tool (B): Draw with customizable size, opacity, and color
     🧽 Eraser Tool (E): Remove parts of your drawing
     🪣 Fill Tool (F): Fill areas with color
     📐 Shape Tool (S): Create rectangles, circles, lines, and triangles

🧩 Working with Layers:
Use the Layers Panel to add ➕, delete ❌, and manage layers. Each layer can be toggled visible/invisible 👁️.

🎞️ Animation:
Use the timeline at the bottom to add frames ➕, navigate 🔁, and play ▶️ your animation. Adjust the frame rate to control playback speed 🕒.

💾 Save Your Work:
Click the Save button to store your project for later editing.

📤 Export:
When finished, use the Export button to save your animation as a GIF or PNG sequence 🖼️.

FlipaCreate combines powerful animation tools with ease of use, making it perfect for everything from simple animated GIFs to complex animation sequences — all in your browser 🌐.


Disclaimer: “Flipaclip” is mentioned only to describe the animation style. This extension is not affiliated with Flipaclip. All trademarks belong to their respective owners, and we fully respect their rights. For any concerns, contact us at customtabsji@gmail.com.

aajlpbohkcfpmgeamipkmpllmgjmmmpa.short_description: Register your daily man-hours on Google Calendar / Outlook Calendar.
aajlpbohkcfpmgeamipkmpllmgjmmmpa.full_description:

https://www.crowdlog.jp/form/trial/

■What is "CrowdLog" ?
This is a cloud-based man-hour management tool.

－Easily enter your work hours and man-hours

You can also input data from your smartphone and link it to Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar.
